name: azure-test-track-pipelines
description: An Azure DevOps Tasks that updates a release plan with test results. This task helps teams integrate test results into their release workflow, ensuring better tracking and visibility of quality metrics.
author: Nathan Araujo

scripts.test:playwright: set INPUT_REPORTTYPE=playwright-json && set INPUT_TESTRESULTSFILEPATH=./test-results/results-playwright.json && npm run test:local
